page.title: 12INTERVIEW:ASHWELL RESIDENT
page.content: The person interviewed was unemployed but used to own a corner store.His wife worked in a local firm.They owned their own terraced house which was built after 1945.One of his daughters had a job in a Swiss Bank in London and the other one travelled to college there. He and his wife usually go to the pub for an evening out. For entertainment at home they have a TV,video recorder, and a BBC home computer. The couple had moved to Ashwell 20 years ago.They{liked the atmosphere of {Ashwell}and village life. He thought that the biggest event to happen in Ashwell in the last few years was the{anniversary celebrations of the{Merchant Taylor's} school.The biggest event in his own life was getting married.
